website_summaries.verdict: If you have the water heater and drainage to cover it, this option offers high quality and a robust shower experience.
pros: Combines the quality of stainless steel, chrome plating, and silicon nozzles
This option is very thin and very wide, yet still provides a lot of pressure over a sizable area
cons: Some note problems with this showerhead leaking and falling apart within a few months

customer_reviews.title: Very happy. Great price
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar one for years tgat was round and 10 inches. Incredible the difference from a 10 to 16. Water pressure evenly distributed. Very happy. Great price. Now hopefully it last.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.text: The shower head arrived as described with a very minor problem that I wasn't really even too concerned about. I received an email asking if I was satisfied and when I told them of the minor issue they sent me out a whole new shower head!! That is great customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Way

customer_reviews.title: but installed easily and seems to perform as designed
customer_reviews.text: Hard to see in upper right of picture, but installed easily and seems to perform as designed.
customer_reviews.author: Journey's End Homes

customer_reviews.title: Nice shower head, but leaking
customer_reviews.text: The feeling of standing under this thing is awesome. This shower head is perfect size. It is heavy though, if you are going to install it on an extender, be prepared to tighten it really-really tight, so it doesn't slip under the weight. Personally, I tried the extender first and then installed a new, longer shower arm to accommodate this head. The reason for the three stars is that it started leaking from the ball joint after only a few showers. So far the leakage is relatively minor, but it is still annoying to have it tilt and splash a bunch of water every couple of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy A. Kropivnitskiy

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the last Chinese shower head I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the last Chinese shower head I ordered. Very beautiful and high quality. Time will tell as to how it holds up, but I am very happy right now.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McLean

customer_reviews.title: Look what I did
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually review anything, but this is an amazing shower head. Granted I did some combination plumbing, :). The wife loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: 3.55 gpm drains a hot water heater quickly
customer_reviews.text: The showerhead works great. However, I found that showers turn cold quickly. It occurred to me that one explanation could be that the showerhead actually uses all the hot water in the 40 gallon hot water heater that feeds it. Unfortunately the flow rate is not provided so I calculated it by filling a 21 gallon container in 5.91 minutes. That yields 3.55 gpm. Hope this helps someone out there.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: No life guard on duty. Shower at own risk.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shower head. Works great with our tankless water heater, but traditional water heaters may struggle to keep warm water flowing. This thing dumps water like crazy, has to be minimum of 9-12gal per minute. The one star deduction is for the fact that the head hold a crazy amount of water and ends up dripping into the next morning, even when tilted down to drain.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shower head! It’s ultra thin and easy to install. The pressure is nice but not overly powerful and will really depend upon the already existing water pressure. It’s not going to increase it as it’s built to be a “rain” shower experience. The only negative Is that the head hold a lot of water once the water is shut off. You will want to tilt it up after completing your shower allowing all the water to drain out of the head otherwise it will drip all day long. Super happy with it otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Montana Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you want. 12 inch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shower head. Looks super sleek and fancy. Finally taking a shower is less uncomfortable ( I personally hate taking showers). You will probably need to buy an extender like I did, but that combined with this 12inch shower head was about the same price as the other brand 12inch shower head on its own. And this one is great. Pretty easy to install, just screw it on there, and there you go. Everyone in my house is super jealous and are demanding one for their birthday's now.
customer_reviews.author: april Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, I have to return it.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice. Its definitely not Nickel plated or anything, its just brushed stainless steel. For my application, this isn't going to work. Its too heavy for the Lordear shower arm extension no matter how much you crank the nuts tight on the extension arm. The arm fails and it all comes down swinging. I thought I had it, it was all up there and just fine until I turned on the water and then, bam. The extra added weight from the head and water is too much. I went to the local store and bought another branded shower arm extension, same thing. Unfortunately, I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Abney

customer_reviews.title: Not so great after all.....
customer_reviews.text: If you have the opportunity to buy one of these, do it! You won't regret it. It's like standing in a monsoon....only it's steaming hot! And you won't want to leave the shower. I've drained my hot water tank twice now... Updat: After 3 months of use, the heads have begun to clog and spray unevenly around the shower. I can see why this was so cheap now. I have softened water, so there should be no hard water buildup. As of today, about a dozen nozzles point in directions other than down. Still nice, but I doubt it will last long at this rate.
customer_reviews.author: Steve & Mary

customer_reviews.title: From my perspective I had considered this to be rated ...
customer_reviews.text: From my perspective I had considered this to be rated a 5 until the side weld busted loose only after 6 months. My home has relatively low water pressure and so this was not likely the cause.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Run out of hot water all the time
customer_reviews.text: Great shower head, feels amazing however, since installing it I run out of hot water very quickly all the time! I believe it’s a really high usage head, I didn’t have this issue before. Be warned.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ma

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: I hate this thing I swear. First off my hot water is gone in an instant and the next person is stuck with cold water(I know it has to do with my set up). Last shower head I had was smaller and used up less water to do the same job! Also the plastic inserts that are attached in the water holes get a pink mold which sucks even more. This thing is cheaply made and just sucks for me. My wife is ok with it but what does she know...I know cars she does not.
customer_reviews.author: Indira Y Grullon

customer_reviews.title: Terrible durability and false advertising
customer_reviews.text: This is not a 4\5 star product. After just 1 year of use, the weld between the top half and bottom split and water started to shoot out sideways. Unaware of the sideways spraying water for several days, the water splashed onto the ceiling and caused water damage to the ceiling. According to the advertising, this product has warranty. After contacting the seller, i received no response. I would give zero stars if i could. Avoid the poor quality and look to other products.
customer_reviews.author: Big Motor

customer_reviews.title: Explosive failure
customer_reviews.text: After using this for a year the side seam split and water came blasting out all over the bathroom. Their 1 year warranty did not cover replacement. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Regretful Purchase - Looks vs Working
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of time and money. Water does NOT come out of all holes. I have to tilt it in all directions to have SOME water come out some of the holes. I have attempted many different installs and still have the same non-working item. This is brand new and does not perform as expected and guaranteed. I am completely disappointed in the performance of this shower head and HIGHLY recommend looking elsewhere. This was a waste of my research time, and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: RR335

customer_reviews.title: Starting to rust after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this shower head.... easy to install and looks dynamic. I have had it for 6 months and it’s starting to rust out. (Picture attached). Ironically for me.... this rain shower is more for looks than function in my master shower, but don’t believe the stainless steel material claim. A tad disappointed... I didn’t expect a lifetime product but anything should last for more than 6 months. Unfortunately you get what you pay for here.
customer_reviews.author: Brent/WashDC

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy when water on for adjustable shower arm
customer_reviews.text: Might have worked, if I could have kept it from collapsing the Clarita Home Adjustable Shower 10" Arm Extension, when it filled with water. It was extremely heavy to begin with but once it filled with water there was no way the adjustable shower arm, even with the gear teeth, could hold it up. It would probably be great for a ceiling mounted shower flange.
customer_reviews.author: 60+ married

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head so far!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been using this for about two weeks now and she absolutely loves it! She's always wanted to rainfall shower head and we finally got one. There was no reason to spend $30-40 or more at a retail store so we tried this one, and so far it is awesome! If we could change one thing it would be to use a little longer shower arm. We knew what we were getting so it's not really a negative. Just make sure to tighten the arm because the shower head is big.
customer_reviews.author: makeawishmn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing showers!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely will need two people to install for balance and stability. Without the regulator, it feels like a heavy downpour. As great as it felt, I felt guilty about eating that much water and pretty regulator back in which made it a light rain. Still felt very good, strong enough, and my conscience doesn't bother me! This looks so fancy in my glass shower. Tip: not all the "water holes" work at the same time. Merely touching them turns them "on." Also if it's crooked then only done will work so make sure it's perfectly straight when installing.
customer_reviews.author: Phaedra Henn

customer_reviews.title: Can't be beat for the price
customer_reviews.text: Even the instruction for this say it's "chrome treated plastic" - but it isn't. It's all metal, built well, and looks great. This was part of a complete shower make-over.
customer_reviews.author: ScottinSoCal

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rain shower head
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product quality and value. Fit a very nice high-end shower remodel job and paired nicely with dual diverter Delta Ara trim shower set. Rain flow nicely covers about 60% of 4x4 shower. Flow seems pretty smooth and steady with good volume and consistent rain flow. Only complaint is the ball joint that connects to water pipe is a little too loose, so just when you have shower set exactly balanced, the slight touch moves it out of position. Easily corrected and does not affect function.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN REVIEWER

customer_reviews.title: Too weighted with water
customer_reviews.text: I was no happy. It has plenty coverage but no pressure. And if on an extended arm. I don’t care how tight you think you get it. The water in this head weights it down either immediately or over a few hours. A series of adjustments every time you want a shower. I took it down.
customer_reviews.author: Danny York

customer_reviews.title: Check your lines mine was full of gunk
customer_reviews.text: Recently moved and the first thing I bought was this shower head, was surprised that the pressure was so low bought this shower head when I took off the old one there was so much gunk in the previous restrictor it was unbelievable. I installed this shower head in 3 minutes with the restrictor and its just like standing in the rain, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shamwow

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Its just wide enough to rain water on your shoulders. The resulting shower is very relaxing. It is wide, so you're going to need an extension arm. The arms on the market have more than one joint. Make sure the joints can be made tight enough to support the weight of the shower head with the water flowing thru it. The shower head will gain a couple of pounds once water flows thru it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Silicone heads are broken in 31 days! Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Right after the window closed to return the item, the shower head broke! The silicone heads all spray in different directions now. Water is coming through the sides as the seems broke because it wasn't molded together well. The shower head is now useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: Very Rich looking, I would think this would have cost a $$$$
customer_reviews.text: I put this in our oversized shower in a a dedicated pipe in the middle, and BAM it looks like I went over the top. the mirrored chrome finish is beautiful, and it's GREAT for taking a shower, completely covered by the large 16" size. the pressure is OK, it's not a deluge, but we bought a "sparkpod" showerhead, so my wife can get the shampoo out of her hair fast with that. I highly recommend this for someone looking to put on the "WOW Factor" with their shower.
customer_reviews.author: MacMaven234

customer_reviews.title: Good rain shower head at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Nice even flow through the many silicone jets. Well chromed and seems well-constructed (no leaks so far.) The only thing that could be improved is the notches on the cylindrical junction that allow it to be gripped by a wrench to tighten on pipe. They are a little narrower than the width of most crescent wrenches, making it difficult to tighten. I ended up using a narrow vicegrip instead of a crescent wrench. Would be nice if the notches were widened on the product.
customer_reviews.author: P M.

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This was truly a waste of money. After about 30days of using this shower head the water no longer flows down. It shoots in many different directions. This product claims to be self cleaning. That couldn’t be further from the truth. There is no calcium build up that could of caused this to occur.
customer_reviews.author: Quicha Ward

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE QUALITY! BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how to contact the company but they need to send me a new piece, the shower head within a couple of months has started to completely leak and has fallen apart. Cheap design. Contact me and fix this issue so that I can change my review.
customer_reviews.author: wd

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews, I concluded that : 16 inch doesn’t really work, is too much. 12 is a good size; don’t buy a expensive one because if it’s welded, no matter the brand, the seams might come undone or, if it has screws, they might rust and die. So, I got this one and absolutely LOVE it, it’s so relaxing, like warm rain falling all around you. The price is reasonable enough that if it breaks, i’ll Just get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Oh good lord, what can I say
customer_reviews.text: Oh good lord, what can I say? I would give this thing 7/5 if I could. I don't know how I took showers before this amazing thing. We did a bathroom remodel, and added this as a second head. It had its own pipe. We don't even use the normal head anymore. Now, I don't know how it would work on a standard shower pipe. We have a 4 ft straight pipe reinforced and dedicated for this. Shower head is straight. Don't know about an angle.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous 423

customer_reviews.title: We didn't know what we were missing
customer_reviews.text: We are in love. We installed an outdoor shower by our pool and have used our indoor shower very little since. We have average water pressure and it works amazing. The product says it is stainless steel, so I am expecting there to be no rust with use, as I read rust developing with similar products that where a little lower in price. I hope to purchase and install one in my master bath soon.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor lover

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it spend a little extra or buy smaller such a disappointment!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received and installed this shower head I was so excited. Then after completion of the installation I fire this beautiful baby up. Then I got my heart crushed half the little holes were barely dripping water and some nothing at all and the main connection was drippping and I applied a generous amount of Plummer’s tape.
customer_reviews.author: DBO

customer_reviews.title: Isn’t for a basic bathroom
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what it looks like HOWEVER if you don’t have a fancy shower tub (or whatever it’s called) and your shower is basic like everyone else’s you’re gonna need to buy an extension I had to buy two extensions. 1 for height and another for length (away from the way) I’ve had it for a few months and have had no problems with it at all but I have had problems with the extension. But everything works fine and I highly recommend it, if you have a good spacious shower, preferably like a ceiling shower.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Ultra Thin Rainfall Shower Head
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this and installed it in our master bathroom. It did shower water out of the head just like shown in the picture. It was too close to the wall so we purchased an extended arm. It still did not fit in our shower like we wanted and ended up purchasing a smaller head that did suit our needs. If your shower can accommodate this head and fit away from the wall and not be too heavy this is a good item. We still have it and hope to use it someday in another home.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: So far owned a few days, and find it to be a lot of value for the money. Seems well made and with high quality materials. I renovated the bathroom in my previous home 2 years ago and spent many hundreds on a basic+ shower head/hand held combo and wished I bought this instead. I bought another 16” for my 2nd bathroom today. Please make sure if you buy the 16” you get an Extention arm that can hold the weight of the shower head. You can also buy a 3 way adapter to install a hand held shower head as well. If it lasts more than a year I’ll update this to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ciesiolka

customer_reviews.title: Item came in a very nice box and was protected by a felt bag
customer_reviews.text: Item came in a very nice box and was protected by a felt bag. However, this is a true rain fall shower head that must have high water pressure and be mounted perfectly flat. Even with the slightest tilt to it water will not come out of the upper holes. There are so many other rainfall shower heads out there that boost the pressure and work much better than this one. I would say keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Love the shower and how it pours from the TOP ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the shower and how it pours from the TOP it really does feel like rain WAY better than my other showerhead However it's not finger print proof like I read somewhere
customer_reviews.author: ALEJANDRO210

customer_reviews.title: 2 years and still running well
customer_reviews.text: For a cheap showerhead, this works amazingly. I've had this for two years now and it works pretty great. Aome spouts may be a little off but it's nothing too extreme and that surprises me because most showerheads have a lifespan of a year and theyre spraying all over the place. Needless to say, i can never go back to a regular showerhead. Hotel showers don't even feel this good. Unless it's also a waterfall
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Truong

customer_reviews.title: Like standing beneath a water fall.
customer_reviews.text: I just can't take enough showers! Ha... love this shower head, but I really wish it came with an extension arm. These are much harder to find at the local hardware, home improvement stores than you would think. The head itself is a five star, but the absence of an arm is my reason for only giving it four.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Priddy

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I love this shower head and once we installed an extended ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this shower head and once we installed an extended shower arm we were ready to go.To about 15 minutes to install both the arm and the shower head. It does use a lot of water. Some of the other reviewers stated that there was another ring that could be installed to lower the water flow but my box did not include anything else. I may take a trip to the local big box store and see if I can find something to cut the flow down.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: When It Rains It Pours !
customer_reviews.text: An incredibly well built and finished shower head enveloping your whole body in a cleansing shower. With over 196 shower nipples to distribute water, it is important to install the flow restrictor for a more gentle shower. Guaranteed for three years I would not hesitate to order another one, especially for the price which is a third of what you would pay at a big box hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeC.

customer_reviews.title: It's really Nice but not for people who likes to shower with water Pressure.
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is pretty Nice, it does need a extra arm and you need to be sure to get one that can hold it. I would probably put this on a guest bathroom since there's virtually no pressure, the water comes out by Gravity, so if you are like me and like pressure, this is not for you, but I would recommend for people who like a gentle shower and something very similar to rain.
customer_reviews.author: ian Chaffardet

customer_reviews.title: Works Good - Nice wide shower head
customer_reviews.text: Looks great - I was hoping it would be able to add a little pressure by building up before coming out of the nozzles like a different shower head I have, but it doesn't. It does good though, but make sure it's mounted directly overhead
customer_reviews.author: Vulcor

customer_reviews.title: Bad stainless steel material quality, started rusting and leaking
customer_reviews.text: The shower was easy to install and worked well for over 1 year, but then it started rusting at one edge and is now leaking from there. It has forced me to have doubts about the material quality and it may not be made from type 304 SS. I am disappointed in this product and will not recommend for long life installations.
customer_reviews.author: ManApp

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shower head, great price, high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is surprisingly a very high-quality shower head. I was not expecting too much considering the price but I have used it for a couple weeks so far and love it. Just make sure when you install it, it is either completely level to the ground or if it is installed at an angle, make sure you up the water pressure to make sure that water comes out all the jets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shower. Like basking in greatness every morning
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I am so excited to show I can practically feel my clothes ripping off in my sleep to use this bad boy. Oh man does this get me clear. Seriously though, this works great. I used it with this shower arm and the two look and work fantastic together!
customer_reviews.author: hashrate

customer_reviews.title: STUNNING Deal
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my $600+ german 10" round overhead with this. It is the BEST bathroom improvement I've made. I used to turn the overhead on "full" to get proper "rainfall". Now I turn it on 1/4 for gentle rain. No hand held unit is even needed with this installed. I already have an 80 gallon hot water heater...if you only have a 30 gallon you may run out of hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Two Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Big rain machine
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty big and really thin. I have an overhead shower from the ceiling. I seem to go through these every 2 years, this one is a lot nicer the all the last ones I bought at a local big box home store. Easy install, the packaging is really high end looking. I think there could be some cost saving done on the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: EE_NMSU

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shower head
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this. Very easy to install, huge water range, great pressure, looks gorgeous. It comes with a restrictior in a separate little bag but I chose not to install, didn’t have to pry it out or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Laina

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: It has broke. Less than a year after purchase the shower head can't be changed in position because whatever holds it in the position stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: After a year and a half using this rain shower, one night got damaged, I wasn’t sure if should call for warranty or just get a new one, I decided to contact the warranty team, it took two days from when I sent the email and when I have the replacement install again, GREAT Customer Service! And the product isn’t bad at all, maybe I received a not that strong unit. BTW it was even better because my wife told me to just get a new one because they wouldnt even respond to my email, her face today was definately a win for me... it doesnt happen very often 🤣🤣🤣
customer_reviews.author: Antonio A Romero G

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome - uses a lot of water though
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a nice looking and functional shower head. The extra wter it uses is well worth it we think. Love that it's square and HUGE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Pacakge, Sturdy Construction,  Reliability???
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Nice packaging. It came with a color box, sealing tape, and extra drain nozzles. 2. Very heavy and sturdy built. 3. Thin profile. 4. Soft water spurts and not too hard. Cons: 1. I read a small percentage of people have problem with the glue that bond the plates coming apart after a year. I'm taking my chances. I'm not going to cry over $25.
customer_reviews.author: DJ DJ

customer_reviews.title: insanely awesome
customer_reviews.text: Insanely Awesome. Installed this with an extension arm (Vida Alegría REACH Solid Brass 18-Inch High Flow Shower Arm Extension). took about 15 minutes. came with a couple of mesh filters, flow restrictor and washers and tape. did *not* use the flow restrictor and i am so glad that i didnt. The shower is pure luxury. All the soft streams add up to a feeling that can be described as standing under a very gentle waterfall. truly amazing experience. well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Roomi

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful shower head
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful shower head. It works so well that without installing the accompanying flow restrictor, our hot water will drain in about 10 minutes. Love it! I do suggest getting an extender arm if your water pipe is anywhere near the wall, otherwise it'll look awkward as you'll have to angle it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Kolobow

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Just installed. Looks good and worked great on test run. Packaging was fairly impressive and they included lots of Teflon tape as well as additional washers. I'm excited!
customer_reviews.author: R L Myers

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for the 1st month. Weak pressure.
customer_reviews.text: It worked very well for the 1st month. Approaching into the month, nozzles started not spraying straight and some wouldn't spray at all. Adjusting the nozzle by hand fixes one and then causes another to do the same thing. It's an endless cycle. At least it keeps those that are bored during their showers entertained. Also, I am not at all impressed with the water pressure from day one. The pressure deteriorated over time. And no, I did not install the regulator.
customer_reviews.author: Hung Banh

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, rusty, leaky, garbage
customer_reviews.text: Cool for a little while, but is made out of cheap metal garbage. Leaks rust and stained my brand new tile with rust. It's been in for about a month. Horrific. Save yourself a nightmare and buy somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful and very works great. We just updated our master bath and this is now my favorite feature in there! Easy to install and clean. Priced very well. Highly recommend and I’m very satisfied. Shipped to me very fast as well.
customer_reviews.author: Julius

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head!
customer_reviews.text: We installed this shower head a year ago and we love it, because it is large and it covers a wide area and at the same time the profile is thin. After a year of use, it still performs like its first day. There is no clogging or any other issues. Lordear's customer service is exceptional. They went above and beyond to answer our questions quickly and precisely.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: Crazy high GPM
customer_reviews.text: The flow rate of this is so high it can empty my water heater of hot water in a mater of minutes. I have to try and close my water valve at my shower when using this shower head because if i don't in about 3 minutes I lose most of my hot water. I believe the person who tested this in the Q/A section that says 15 GPM. So if you want a high water bill buy this. If not keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Abu1234

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product, but a FYI is when you turn off the water it will continue to leak out of the lowest holes for a while. Just a normal design issue of having a pan of water basically
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like standing in rain
customer_reviews.text: Not a shower head for people that use a pressure washer to shower. Low pressure, evenly distributed. Easy install, comprehensive set of accessories (spare nozzles, gaskets with and without filter, restrictor, plumber's tape).
customer_reviews.author: ZigZagJoe

customer_reviews.title: Great waterfall unit for its price
customer_reviews.text: I love the amount of water that pours through it, but with that said - if your water conservationist this will bother you how much water runs through it. Overall good purchase for a waterfall configuration!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first rain shower head I've ever used. I love it! Hubby installed it himself. He's no slouch with the tools, but he's no plumber either. He said it was simple. Works great. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: shir

customer_reviews.title: Spa feels. Upgrade your shower!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great buy for the price! We needed a true rain shower head and this was it. The water falls heavy and feels like a spa.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and great pressure
customer_reviews.text: Remodel bathrooms for a living, and this shower head it’s beautiful and more than impressed about the Water pressure is the best, beautifully done, great for business if you want to impress your customers
customer_reviews.author: Davids farez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine up for a year and half and works great!! couple of the holes were acting up after a little while but just pushed them around and its been working great!!! i love this thing highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Al Tamar

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re on the fence about this shower head, go for it! It is absolutely amazing! The pressure is perfect. I was nervous that it was going to be too light, but bought it based off of the reviews. Very easy to install. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Nicole Panach

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Went from a very expensive Delta 8 inch to this 16 inch rain head. It is fantastic. Feels great standing under it. Feels like soft rain. AAA++++
customer_reviews.author: Chip Scratchley

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use just yet
customer_reviews.text: Although it is good quality, it is very heavy. I have not yet found an extension arm that can hold it. Unfortunately we are unable to use it until that happens.
customer_reviews.author: Keepitreal

customer_reviews.title: Needs faster flow  IMHO
customer_reviews.text: I have very good pressure and this head is a little to soft. Im looking to wash my hair a little faster is all.
customer_reviews.author: DeFilippo

customer_reviews.title: I am blown away by how nice this shower head is
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away by how nice this shower head is! I did not expect the quality to be so high. It is heavy and shiny and beautiful! The water comes out like a heavy rain!! And the little nipples on the shower head keep it from getting wet, so it will not get all spotty! It's perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: momlady

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS OUR SECOND ONE!
customer_reviews.text: Liked it so much in the guest bathroom that when I re-did the master bath we put one in there too. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it!!! The rain shower is awesome. I replaced an outdate fixture, which I am going to put in the guest bath. I don't quite have it positioned yet the way I want it added,of course, an extender arm. Very well made product. Highly recommended.👍
customer_reviews.author: Diana S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing showerhead!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shower head, I love it. Also I have very hard water and have had it for a few months now and the nozzles are still working like new would recommend 110% Update! Been 1 year since using and have very hard water and the nozzles still work prefect and again I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Gary M Zahn

customer_reviews.title: Great water flow and coverage.
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd rain shower head and I must say it's the best one. It was so easy to install, it took longer to find the ladder. The coverage of water flow is great also.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Potter

customer_reviews.title: Huge rain shower Head 👍
customer_reviews.text: I have had this showerhead for about 1 month. It appears to work perfect with 0 issues. My previous rain shower head was an 8" square, so going to 16" was a massive gain in water coverage. Make sure to check the width of your tub and have a good shower curtain because this thing is huge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Too much fun to take a shower outside and pretend it's raining.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Boncha

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow I love this shower head. The misses loves it also just saying. If anyone complains that there’s not enough water pressure it’s called a rain shower shower head. Key word rain shower. Lol. I also set mine up with a high pressure wand I love the set works great.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The product is beautiful with very good quality materials
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in 3 days with standard shipping. Installed in less than 5 minutes, One go around with Teflon tape, hand tighten followed with a quarter inch turn with wrench... The product is beautiful with very good quality materials..... the shower experience was delightful ... this rain shower head brings everything to a new level of luxury.... don't even think twice about buying
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I didnt install the regulator though. That part was a little confusing but when I purchased this I wasn't planning on using it anyway. I bought a 17 inch arm with this so it would be in the middle of the shower and it works exactly as I wanted it to.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Seems well built...
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy so a special rail across the top of the shower had to be made. Nice to just sit under and relax...I fell asleep(in sit in a shower chair).
customer_reviews.author: IAWFilmWorks

customer_reviews.title: Cheap because it’s crap.
customer_reviews.text: Trash. We used it maybe 10 times over 4 months and it corroded on the side and started shooting water into the ceiling. We also have a high end whole home water softener/filter which should prevent this even more. Get a better brand name
customer_reviews.author: anzac

customer_reviews.title: Almost like standing in a nice rain shower
customer_reviews.text: Was leery of this being too big and heavy but it wasn't. Hubby is not a handyman but he was able to install it. It makes for a world of difference over the old standard head we head. Almost like standing in a nice rain shower.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great rain shower head
customer_reviews.text: I love rain showers. I bought two. One for the master shower and one for my boys’ shower. Covers a lot of area and very soothing. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, great performance, a true stand out.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shower head, unlike many other rainfall shower heads it offers a wide amount of coverage due to the size of the head. It's a great looking addition to our walk in shower, and the chrome finish looks clean. One of my favorite purchases I've made recently. The only downside is I do feel like it uses a significant amount more water than our previous head, but the improvement in the pressure and coverage makes this a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: ACP1125

customer_reviews.title: Shower with your Honey
customer_reviews.text: Relaxing. Needs a reliable extension arm. Tilt after shower to help it drain. Perfect for couple showers.
customer_reviews.author: OsoChowlute

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous product
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great for a month until it broke off and almost crushed my foot or stabbed it not sure what material it is made of but definitely wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Uses all your hot water
customer_reviews.text: Nice flow, easy to install and no leaking but WOW this shower head uses A LOT of water. I went from never running out of hot water to running out in 5 minutes of showing. Buyer beware. Everything else is great.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: As described, good quality, excellent price and super fast shipping. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: As described, good quality, excellent price and super fast shipping. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: atr67

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was good delivered on time was as described. As far as how it works, at first I thought the pressure should be a little better. As time went on I've grown to absolutely love it! It submerges me with a light constant rain. I would definitely recommend but don't expect a pressure that massages.
customer_reviews.author: Gina S. TX

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: A nice product! Installed in with a new 12” 90-deg shower extension.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Don’t go larger than the 12” for water Pressure
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shower head. If you’re looking for good pressure this 12” head works wonderful. Any larger reudices the water flow as i tried the 16” first and returned it for a smaller one. I’m very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Tedd

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough about this wonderful product. It is so loved in this house. Great quality and a dream to use. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Lanie

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 18 months
customer_reviews.text: It's nice while it lasts. After using for 18 months, it split open, spraying water out the side
customer_reviews.author: Ninove

product_meta.title: Lordear 12 Inch Rainfall Shower Head Solid Square Ultra Thin 304 Stainless Steel Polish Chrome 12 Inch Rain Shower Head,Waterfall Full Body Coverage with Silicone Nozzle
feature_bullets: High Quality rainfall showerhead - the entire material for this shower head body is #304 Stainless Steel; there is no any fragile plastic parts
12 inch adjustable Stainless steel polish finish, Ultra thin with only 2mm Eco-friendly and make your bathroom look fancy and shining
The nozzle is made of silicone; which is much easier to remove the sediment
Please kindly note that because the water pressure in each family is different, the water pressure or size of water column of the Shower Head is different also. This this is normal and reasonable.
Lordear promise 3-months return and money back, 2-years warranty and life -time maintenance,please buy with confidence.
